title: [1508521049] Chilli Poached Pears with Star Anise Dust | Gordon Ramsay
description:
Gordon's mum steps into the kitchen to give a hand on this modern, delicious twist on poached pears. Saffron gives it a beautiful fragrance, with the chilli providing the kick.

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
